definition: surface of the body/periphery of the body/body thermometer/(literary) a person's appearance
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Methods Catching by gluing in the cave vicinity and body surface of host's animal.
sentences.chinese: 方法洞穴粘捕法和宿主動物體表檢蚤法。

sentences.english: Humidity has a huge role. As we sweat we bring liquid to the surface of our skin.
sentences.chinese: 溼度是一個很大的原因，因排汗等於將水分帶到體表。

sentences.english: These five principles represent the crystallization of the UN Charter.
sentences.chinese: 這五項原則是聯合國憲章的具體表現。

sentences.english: Body surface of pine wood nematode is covered with a layer of viscous polysaccharose.
sentences.chinese: 松材線蟲體表具有一層粘液狀多糖物質。

sentences.english: He never had been able to give form to that ambition.
sentences.chinese: 他從來不能夠具體表現那個企圖心。

sentences.english: Methods The specimens of ticks were collected with white cloth from grassland and picked from animals' body surface.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用布旗法和動物體表採集法採獲蜱類標本。

sentences.english: It is particularly serious if more than two thirds of the body surface has been burned.
sentences.chinese: 超過體表面積三分之二的燒傷尤其嚴重。

sentences.english: He found in the Master the embodiment of the Vedanta scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 他發現師父是吠檀多經文的具體表現。

sentences.english: The abstract notion of a resource is realized as a concrete representation.
sentences.chinese: 一個資源的抽象符號會被實現爲一個具體表現。

sentences.english: Cleaner wrasses (Labroides dimidiatus) are small marine fish that feed on the external parasites of larger fish.
sentences.chinese: 裂脣魚是小海魚，以大魚體表的寄生蟲維生。

sentences.english: Component structure of the outer covering and flight surfaces of all modern birds.
sentences.chinese: 現代鳥類體表和翼面覆蓋的結構。

sentences.english: Conclusion The advantage of the method is the design-line is the regular physical m…
sentences.chinese: 結論根據自然體表標誌設計重瞼手術，簡單易行。

sentences.english: In general, discusses the realization of the RFID card's application in the consumption field.
sentences.chinese: 整體上論述了射頻卡在消費領域中應用的具體表現。

sentences.english: The feature of body surface isopotential mapping of those RBBB is described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了RBBB的體表等電位圖圖型特點。

sentences.english: All the lice on the body surface of the hosts were completely collected.
sentences.chinese: 用“全捕法”採集其體表全部吸蝨。

sentences.english: Objective To get a new calculating measurement of cardiac potential on body surface produced by depolarization of ventricle.
sentences.chinese: 目的由心室除極產生體表電勢的新計算方法。

definition: to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
